description:
Form plugin (e.g. Contact Us, Appointment Request, Pricing Inquiry form etc.) for Bubble. üìù

When the end user submits the form, it is received in the Sociocs Inbox, form where, you can reply back.  

- Plugin instructions: https://docs.sociocs.com/integrations/bubble/plugin-form/#plugin-installation
- Plugin demo: https://sociocs-plugins.bubbleapps.io/version-test/form_demo

Sociocs inbox is available as web app and mobile apps.

- Web App: https://app.sociocs.com
- Mobile Apps: https://mobileapps.page.link/sociocs

This plugin works for both PAID and FREE Sociocs accounts.

Other plugins: https://sociocs-plugins.bubbleapps.io/version-test/
name: Sociocs - Form
